item.title: Pete Hegseth Is Right for the DOD
item.description: If the U.S. military wants to maintain its standing with the American people, its leadership needs to display some moral courage.

item.title: The GOP’s New Coalition Requires a New Economic Agenda
item.description: Help the needy, not the greedy, as a wise man once argued.

item.title: Let Me Be Frank: Stop Bilking Taxpayers in Order to Bilk Taxpayers
item.description: Governments’ habit of spending your money to convince you to give them more money is getting ridiculous.

item.title: Will Trump Choose Victory or Defeat in Ukraine?
item.description: Victory is achievable. Defeat would be catastrophic. The choice is now Trump’s.

item.title: At the Venice Biennale, the Woke Gondola Is Sinking
item.description: Themes of inclusion and exclusion seem muddled and worn.
